accommodations.name: Cabin
accommodations.description: All cabins are fully-equipped with everything necessary for relaxing after a day full of impressions. The cabins are designed to host 2 people + 1 child, some of the cabins have a seating area. We have twin and double cabins, you can choose the preferred option when booking a trip.
features: Twin or double at your choice

accommodations.name: Yacht
accommodations.description: If you travel with your friends, you can rent the whole yacht to join us at any of the proposed trips. Our yachts can host up to 12 people + kids. The prices depend on the type of the yacht you book. Whatever your choice is, you get the modern, fully-equipped yacht with professional crew.
